Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Has a whopping 42x zoom lens, vari-angle LCD display, full HD video, built-in GPS, good image quality
Cons: No RAW format support, lacks dedicated ISO button, slow autofocus
The Nikon Coolpix P510 has a whopping 42x zoom lens -- the longest zoom currently available on a consumer camera -- so it has attracted a considerable amount of buzz among photography enthusiasts and technology experts. This 16.1-megapixel camera also includes a 3-inch LCD display, built-in GPS and full HD (1080p) video. ...

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Pros: Compact, mini-SLR design body with great grip Zoom range from 24 to 1,000mm equivalent Effective optical image stabilization Built-in GPS Second Zoom lever on lens barrel Lots of Movie options including Full HD and slo-mo Stereo audio recording Articulated 920K dot LCD User-definable Function button Polished menu system Excellent optical quality, especially considering the long focal length Good Macro performance Very good print quality Active D-Lighting Multishot modes Fast startup time Good shutter lag numbers Fast image transfer time

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: CoolPix P510 Not The Best Camera For The Money
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Picture Quality
Cons: Feels Cheaply Made - Battery Charging On Camera - Zoom Takes Too Long To Focus
Owning a Canon Powershot 30IS with 35x zoom, I decided to buy the Nikon Coolpix for the 42x zoom. I am very disappointed with this camera. The picture color is very nice, but other features fall far short. 1st the zoom does not zoom in as close as the Canon 35x. I compared them side by side taking pictures and my Canon zooms in closer. If you have time and do not mind waiting, you have to wait for it to focus on a subject with having to zoom it in and out a few times, pressing the shutter half way down continueously till it focus's on it. I use it only for flowers for that reason. Wildlife is gone by the time it focus's in. The LCD screen is nice, but the screen doe ... s not fold inward like the Canon. It faces out when shut which I think it will get scratched or more wear on it alot easier - very bad design. The Canon flips out to the side and the Nikon just pulls out towards you. The whole camera has to be plugged into the outlet for it to charge. It comes with the charger, but the battery cannot be charged outside of the camera which I really do not like and the saleman at Best Buy told me the whole camera doesn't have to be plugged in, which wasn't true. The lens cap does not have a clip on it like the Canon to secure it to the neck strap, so it just dangles. The battery compartment opener along with the side usb port opener feels very cheap. It is lighter than the Canon and for me is a little harder to take pictures because it seems to move more when the shutter is pressed. I have to try and hold it more steadier. It has noise when zooming and changing features which sound a little clunky. I am not a professional photographer, but take alot of pictures of nature and as far as I am concerned, the Nikon Coolpix P510 is not all it's cracked up to be. The only good thing about this camera is the picture color. I have not tried the video which I would very rarely use. And will never use the GPS. I do not need a GPS on my camera. My next camera will definetly be another ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Best point and shoot I've seen
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price, easy to use, lots of built in features
Cons: Still a bit heavy
This is my new favorite camera, I just bought this yesterday and read a lot before my purchase. I currently own a small Kodak pocket camera with a 3X zoon and 10.1 mega pixels, actually takes great pics. I own a Nikon D60 SLR camera, which I've had about 5 years now. My latest purchase was yesterday and buying the Coolpix P510. I have not tested EVERY feature so far, but I like what I've seen so far.
It's not pocket size at all but it much lighter than my slr and not as cumbersome. What I like most about it is, I do not have to be constantly changing lenses for the shot I want. This camera does it all. From extreme close ups to 1000 mm/42X zoom.
This camera comes packaged with every ... thing you'll need except a SD card and you probably already have that. This camera comes with a lens cover, a wrist strap, a neck strap, rechargeable battery, battery charger, 2 CD's and two sets of cords, one for the TV and one for the camera. One CD contains a manual (comes with a written one as well) and the other CD is if you want to load the pics straight from your camera to your computer. You do not have to use this program, I didn't load it as I use an SD reader in my computer.
You have to charge this battery while in the camera. If you want to be able to charge the battery (for if you buy and extra battery) outside the camera, you'll have to buy a separate charger for that. You can always buy an extra battery and charge up the extra while the camera is not in use.
I have not yet tested the video for this camera. So I have no comments on that.
This camera has a lot of features, I like the fact it has a viewfinder you can use when in bright sunlight as sometimes the LED screens are hard to see. I like the tilt LED screen makes taking odd angle shots much easier. I love the ease of use. I love not having to change lenses all the time. Some of the extra features on this camera are Flash, push a little button to pop up the flash it does NOT automatically pop up but takes good pics ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Zoom range, compact size
Cons: Focus is not consistent, slow to fix, Needs external battery charger
My last camera was a Kodak 6MPixel 12x Zoom. The Kodak had a much better focus lock-on function. Taking movies with the Nikon P510 has the focus hunting in and out in the automatic focus setting. When using the fixed focus mode, and distance to the subject changes (common in sporting events), then focus can't be readjusted manually, once the recording starts. In still picture mode, at higher zoom levels, it sometimes refuses to lock into focus at all. 42X zoom is fantastic! Picture quality and color fidelity are excellent. Low light performance is more than adequate, considering the amount of glass that must be between the sensor and subject. I had to buy an external batt ... ery charger, and 2nd extra battery from ebay. Battery life is reasonable, but not exceptional. I now own 3 batteries for this camera. I have had this camera for about 2 months and have taken about 2 hours of video, and 400+ photos. I typically use the small viewfinder, and not the LCD screen. I normally wear glasses and the diopter adjust for the viewfinder works great. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 42x zoom, 99-point focus, swivel LCD, EVF, compact size for a superzoom
Cons: Would be nice if LCD could swivel closed to protect it.
This camera takes very good quality pictures for a point-and-shoot camera, and the 42x zoom really lets you capture far away subjects with ease. Image stabilization permits hand held shots at 42x in most conditions. You can set the camera in full-auto mode and shoot away, or select one of the manual modes and take more creative control over your shots. The camera has dual-zoom controls, so in addition to the control surrounding the shutter release, there is also a zoom control on the lens body; this is very helpful in eliminating zoom noise when acquiring video. This camera is capable of full HD video. There are dedicated controls for the ... most common functions, and the menu system is quite logical and easy to follow. The camera has a USB cable for transferring images, as well as charging with the supplied adapter or via a computer USB port. It is correctly identified in Linux and can transfer images via drag and drop over this cable. Overall this is an excellent all-around camera for close as well as far away subjects. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Sharp 42x Zoom
Cons: Freezes Up & Delete All Images Intermittent
Love the huge zoom and excellent image quality at 42x, with or without a tripod. Would recommend Nikon provide an external battery charger, on camera external ISO selector, multi-shot selector. I had 2 major problems: (1.) The "delete all for images" is intermittent and should be located in the screen menu. Sometimes it only offers erase 1 image. (2.) Freeze-ups. After taking a few hundred successful shots, I shut it down. Turned on for another shot and it froze while zooming. Waited a few minutes and had to take out battery to shut it down. It then damaged the memory card. "Memory Card Cannot Be Used." The card had been used in my D7000 for some time and I did format it with the P510. The card could n ... o longer be read in any computer or camera. Day 2: Inserted and formatted new card. Took a few hundred more pictures and then turned it off. Turned it on and it froze again while zooming. This time I took the card out to shut it down. I put the card in my D7000 to view the pictures and it said no images were on the card. Stuck it back in the P510 and it also said no images on the card. Took a picture with the camera and checked to view the picture. Now the older pictures became viewable and thus I was able to load them on my computer except one blank image. Purchased at Best Buy 4 days ago and exchanged it today. Called Nikon and the tech was not aware of the problem and had no answers other than to exchange it. BTW it was made in China, if that matters. No firmware updates yet for the P510. I must say that the camera is a much smarter investment than a 500mm lens and a 2x tele-converter for abut $9000, and not knowing if you will get soft images or not. Save your money, buy this camera and buy a good used car instead of thowing huge bucks on huge lenses. BTW the card was a PNY SDHC Class 10 16gb and worked great in my D7000. I suspect the problems can be fixed with firmware. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use, versatility, excellent zoom, HD video
Cons: Size
I have had multiple point and shoot (P&S) cameras, but have always been disappointed with the speed of the camera and the picture quality. So I decided to "take the next step" for my next camera. Initially, I was looking into buying a DSLR, but one of the sales associates introduced me to the Nikon P510.
For me, this was the perfect fit!
I don't know enough about cameras or picture taking to know when and how to use the different lenses that are required with a DSLR. Plus, I didn't want to lug around a backpack full of lenses every time I wanted to take pictures.
The P510 was perfect. It's 42X (optical) zoom is really quite amazing. We went to Alaska for a family trip and I was able t ... o get pictures of wildlife from a great (and safe) distance with amazing clarity. It has a ton of different features that let you really enhance the pictures.
The only negative is the size, compared to a regular P&S. It definitely won't fit in your pocket. But it is still smaller than some of the DSLRs out there. The battery life on it is very good. I was able to go about 2-3 days on a singe charge. Over the 6 days in Alaska, I took over 1200 shots. With a 16.1MP sensor, not only the pictures, but the HD 1080 video comes out amazingly sharp and clear.
If you're looking for a better P&S camera, but don't feel like fussing with all the intricacies of a DSLR, the P510 might just be the camera for you. Good luck out there! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: ease of use, many features
Well, I just got this today from Best buy... was the first one to pick this today morning. I spent sometime with this in the afternoon with Auto and PASM options. I have not tried the video yet. Overall based on the features this ones has most of the bells and whistles. The quality id good (see uploaded pictures - both in Auto and large A mode). I am yet to explore more but at present like the look, the sturdy feel, the features and the price. The long zoom is good and can be managed well with your other hand on the lens. I have tried few pics both indoors and outdoors and they have come out well. a 16M pixel pic is 5.4 MB. The battery came fully charged and so far with little use its holding good charge. I am not a pro photographer and have not used ... other bridge camera or DSLR thus cannot compare quality of the image but I am a avid photographer and use my iphone-4S a lot thus am pleased with the image quality -- the color detail the camera captures is good. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: It takes very nice quality pictures that are compairable to DSLR photos. It has a wonderful focus.
Cons: Doesn't do well in different temperatures.
The Nikon P510 is my first real camera. I have used small digitals but nothing like this. The settings are very useful and easy to understand. This camera takes amazing pictures that I can compare to that of a DSLR. The zoom will take amazing pictures up to it's breaking point. Another amazing thing is that it is light weight and is very easy to carry around. It takes beautiful portraits. A not so wonderful thing about this camera: I had to get the battery replaced and then the camera replaced within a month. I am sure it was just a fluke but it was still very upsetting. I was using it at a very important event and then i ... t just shorted out and died. It was in no way my fault. Also, this camera does not like bright lighting at all. This camera is perfect for beginners. I bought this camera as a tool to use until I invested in a DSLR. Even when I do decided to purchase the DSLR I will probably still use this camera quite a bit because of it's strong performance and because of how light it is. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Photo and Video Quality
Cons: Battery Life
Great all around shooter. Not ready for a DSLR this is the trick. I went in for a Nikon d5100 and found this camera. Not disapointed at all. Fast for the kids and pets. The macro setting is awesome. Have taken around 1000 pics in about a month and 2 have been not good, my fault learning the settings. The GPS feature is great as well. When traveling you can use the geo tagging feature so when posting to Facebook it posts where the pictures were taken. The 1080p is crisp and clear. Motor sounds while zooming in video mode are minimal. All around a great little camera. Best Buy ran it on sale after I bought it, retuned with my reciept and got money back. Thanks Best Buy.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I just restarted birding and replaced my 12x zoom Panasonic with this one. I have already made shots that would never have been possible with the Panasonic. Even in overcast skies, hand held,shooting from a blind at 42x zoom in the shade, I was getting about a third of my shots in focus. I am sure I will get better with more practice. The detail at 42x is impressive and allowed for cropping and on my better shots, digital zoom. The camera has a nice feel to it, its weight makes for a steady hold. Operation is straight forward and transferring pictures to the computer is made with an SD card. I highly recommend the camera to anyone, regardless of experience. B&H Camera was letter perfect, in their product description, shopping cart, package and shipping. I could not be happier ... with their service expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great step up from point and click
Item.Review:
Pros: picture clarity, zoom,
Cons: battery life
This is my 1st semi professional camera. Upgrading from a point and click. I needed a camera with an extensive zoom and takes great night pics. Love the clarity of my pics. I've used it to zoom in to buildings far away in daylight and they show up great. Low light and night pics are clear too. The flash is bright. Battery life is like 4 hours using it constantly. Charges in about 4 hours fully. Several effects to choose from and scenes. Great camera for someone who is ready to upgrade from the $100 point and clicks but not ready to spend $1,000 plus additional for lenses. Video is clear and mic picks up everything. Screen rotates up and down for higher or lower shots. Compared it to the Canon Sx40 which did not have the same zoo ... m or pixels but the monitor rotates so you can take front facing pics. This way I can take a pic of me without asking someone to hold my camera or carry a tripood.. Used it now for 3 weeks. Novice photographer but love taking nature pics, outdoor scenes, vacation photos and Facebook. Heavy so I still need my point and click for my purse. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Lens
Cons: Battery Life
Overall, this camera is very easy to use. If you are a beginner and looking for a camera that is pretty simple to point and shoot, then look into this camera. I use it a lot indoors for my daughters plays and the cameras lens really helped me get my shots. The battery life is NOT GOOD. So keep an eye on what you shoot (video/picture) and if you are using the LCD display or not. My only complaint about this camera is the battery power. Other than that, it's a good camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Canera, but a couple of Shortcomin
Item.Review: After using the camera about 2 months, I can say that for 90% of my shooting situations it is a perfect camera, and it beats the heck out of carring a backpack full of lenses. The telephoto is awsome, I have a frame filling photo of the supermoon last month to prove it. The in-camera crop and save is also a wonderful feature. Now the dislikes: 1.) No provision for attaching filters. I have been able to juryrig a solution to this, but it involves modifying a lens protector and the use of electrical tape, so it is not the best of situations. 2. A very limited apaeture stop down. F/8 is about a small as it will go. And because there is no provision for filters it is not easy to use NDF's. My solution above should allow me to use NDF's now though. 3.) Short battery life. Solution: c ... arry a spare. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture quality, 42x zoom, image stabilization
Cons: Close focusing
I've had this camera a few weeks and have been impressed with the image quality, especially considering how far out it can zoom. Even at 42x I am able to get very sharp pictures without a tripod so the image stabilization works very well. I have also got some very good landscape pictures using a wider angle. The only thing which does not work well is continuous focus when trying to focus on a small object 6inches or less in width. In this situation it jumps in and out of focus, if I turn off continuous focus mode it focuses fine. I also like that you can see the image either through the viewfinder or on the screen at the back. My other camera is an SLR but the P510 weighs less than half as much as an SL ... R with 300mm lens and makes a good lightweight camera for travel or hiking. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use and features
Cons: Can't add a protective lens filter
Great camera for work and play. Much easier than having to carry multiple lenses. Included lens is more than enough for almost all users. Auto fcous is fast. Camera still has settings if you want to customize photos. Lots of features for the money.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: It's everything I wanted in a digital camera
Item.Review:
Pros: The Zoom and stabilization at full zoom is incredible
Cons: It needs a HOT SHOE and away to fire the shutter remotely
I wanted a a GOOD camera. I was sick and tired of the smaller point and shoot cameras. I was always misplacing them plus they didn't have the focal lengths I wanted and shutter lag wasn't very good either. I wanted a DSLR I could carry on my motorcycle. I soon realized the first it was going to cost thousands to get a DSLR with the lenses I wanted. I also realized that it was going to be a BIG PAIN to carry it on the motorcycle and who knows what type of abuse it would take... Then a friend mentioned the P510. I did some homework on it and it seemed too go to be true... I did some more homework and looked in some professional listings and found someone w ... ho does Lunar and Solar photography with a P510. She does th lunar shot's stock and I was amazed at the pics she had and on in particular that she did a side by side comparison of a $16,000.00 Cannon and very expensive lens and the stock P510... Well the Cannon was just a bit better... BUT That sold me... Do a search on P510 in Google+, you'll see what I'm talking about. It's not often you buy something now a days and am as satisfied as I am... The pics it takes makes me look like a genius.. YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED, Especially for the price!!! 2 more people at work have bought one after seeing and trying mine out. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: I bought it for the zoom and it has been great.
Cons: Plugging camera in to recharge battery.
I am just a picture taker and depend on the camera to do all the work. I love super zoom lenses that are part of the camera. The Nikon Coolpix P510 does all the work well and the zoom is incredible. The all purpose setting (intelligent) has been all I have needed in many different environments. I am looking forward to what I can do once I read the instructiions.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything!
Cons: Nothing Yet!
I purchased this camera in June to record my son's sports, the Nationals drive to the World Series and an overseas trip. I have found this camera to be a gem! Having taken pictures for many years, this camera far surpasses a number of previously owned cameras. Easy to use, high quality results (even in lo-light situations) and great action shots in the sports mode. The second benefit is the video. Though I did not purchase it for videos, the results exceed the videos I get with my Sony HD video camera (even in lo-light). This is a superb all around camera with great features and results. And the battery life is also noteworthy as it lasts quite a long time to my surprise. Oh, one other thing, the zoom is great!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use
Cons: Auto-focus sometimes has trouble with long zoom shots
When I was ready for a camera, I knew what features I wanted: long focal length, ease of use with manual mode compatibility, compact size and decent price. I found them all - in a NIKON! The optics are outstanding with smooth operating zoom and auto-focus functions - very quiet. The movie quality is very sharp in full 1080p HD mode, although the sound pick-up could be better, and there isn't a provision for an external mic. The high-speed video function (120 FPS) is a blast to use - it's amazing to be able to capture the elusive 'milk drop in mid-plop'. Overall, for the money, it's a real pleasure to use, and one of the best values out there.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: User friendly, fantastic photo quality
Cons: No external battery charger, shortish battery life
I absolutely love this camera. The Nikon Coolpix technology is very user friendly and easy to use. I had been wanting to purchase this camera for a while and I am so glad that I finally did! I have used both the macro feature as well as the portrait feature extensively and both perform higher than expected. I definitely recommend this camera for personal use, as well as small business use.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 42X zoom
Cons: Included charger only charges battery while in camera.
I have owned this camera for a little over a month, and it is a great camera. I bought it because it has many of the features of a DSLR, but it is a lot lighter. Picture quality is excellent, and the camera is relatively easy to use. I LOVE the 42X zoom. It beats having to change lenses.
My only beef is the charger that is included with the camera only charges the battery while it is in the camera, and you can't use the camera when it is plugged in charging the battery. Nikon does make a stand-alone charger for the battery used in the P510. I was able to buy one separately. Having a stand-alone charger and a backup battery enables me to continue to use the camera while charging my second batter ... y. If the camera came with the stand-alone charger, I would have given it 5 stars. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use. Great pictures.
Cons: None so far.
I am really glad I bought this camera. Exactly what I was looking for. Some positives about this camera.
1. Takes quality pictures without having to carry around a bulky DSLR. 2. Great in low light. 3. Curves and rubber grips makes it easy to hold with one hand. 4. Takes great videos and built in microphone is good. 5. The zoom is amazing. Pictures are nice even when fully zoomed. 6. Very easy to use. 7. Half the price of a DLSR.
Conclusion: DLSR cameras do take superb pictures. But if you don't want to spend that much money and don't want to carry around a bigger camera, but want more than a "pocket" camera, then this Nikon Coolpix is just the answer. The camera is compact, easy to use, ... half the cost, and yet takes very clear crisp pictures. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: This camera has all the bells and whistles.
Item.Review:
Pros: The zoom is amazing. Excellent picture quality.
Cons: Price is a bit high.
Unbelievable pictures. Great zoom. Great special features. Takes picture immediately when you push the button (no 2 second delay). Easy to use.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent zoom, good price, excellent picture quality
Cons: Bit heavy, flash is too bright
I'm loving my new camera for the most part. I'm really enjoying the 42x zoom as it has allowed me to get photos of wildlife that I never would've been able to get before because I would never have been able to get close enough to them without scaring them off.
It is a bit heavy, but does come with a sturdy neck strap and a rubberized hand grip which help tremendously. The only other complaint I've had so far is that in the "party/indoor" mode, the flash is SUPER bright - too bright really, but if you don't use the flash then everyone has to stay perfectly still while the shot is taken.
I'm still learning how to use all the special features, but so far I love it!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: By extending the optical zoom to 42X (actually 180/4.3=41.86) Nikon put to shame the theorists which stated that all zoom bigger than 24X is useless since you have to get a tripod. Thus the outstanding feature of this camera is an incredible hand held IQ at its telephoto end and that's mainly because the IS, optical and not by sensor shift, is outstanding. More than that, the digital zoom (2X) is better than usual. There is no RAW, but there is a noise control (high, normal, low) and a picture control (standard, vivid,neutral and two custom savings of sharpening, contrast and saturation). There is also a D-lighting (high, normal, low) for contrast correction, which can be activated both on shooting or on playback. Unfortunately there are also some minor, but rather disturbing drawbacks: ... for me the main one is an unjustified correlation between the ISO and the minimum shutter speed in the M mode: if you raise the ISO, the maximum time get down and that is more annoying as their Night Landscape setting is very modest, to say the least. Other drawbacks: if you want to use a tripod, you have to select time and again for each shot the self timer to let the vibrations die; in the playback mode there is no way to go from one zoomed in image to the other. The video mode looses focus on the telephoto end, but there there is also a workaround: start filming at the telephoto end and then go up or down with the zoom without any problem. I didn't test the GPS, but read a very good posting with images that showed it was rather slow and inefficient. It lacks also a filter thread or a horse shoe. Like every camera of this size, it needs a spare battery and a charger in order to shoot without long imposed pauses. All in all it is a remarkable superzoom camera, that with minor improvements could be almost perfect. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: The zoom is great, and it is not complicated to use
Cons: Sports shots in the evening or in the dark
I have been using this camera about 6 months now. I have loved almost everything about it. Quick focus, excellent zoom, not too heavy and really easy to figure out extra settings. Now that fall is here, I have found the only draw back so far. I have been taking late evening, and night shots at football games and the sports feature doesn't take good night shots and the dusk/dawn feature doesn't take good sports shots. Love this camera!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: dont know yet
Cons: we didnt get everything in the box
our friend ordered one first and so we liked it and ordered one too. we only got the camera and the charge cord, where our friend got a cord with 3 colors on it and a cord to hook to the computer. we got an instruction cardboard but no thick booklet? we cant download any pictures to our computer. he said to ask you for them. we dont know how to use it fully...

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Light weight, simple to use good price!
Cons: Cant find one
My fiance and I were looking for a light weight, simple to use camera to take to Italy with us on our honeymoon in October. After researching all the cameras that are on the market we found that this particular model served all of our needs. The photos that we have taken have come out beautiful. Our family and friends are amazed and we have been known as the "couple with the high tech camera". Although it isn't as high tech as the other cameras out there the after product of the pictures when we get them processed makes it appear that it truly is high tech. We are very happy with our purchase and can't wait to take amazing pictures on our honeymoon!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: This camera does it all and then some!
Item.Review:
Pros: Takes great indoor auditorium pics, great moving pics, and the zoom is second to none
Cons: Cannot charge the battery out of the camera, unless you get a separate batter charger, so cant use while charging
We spent 2 weeks in the UP of Michigan and I took over 2000 pictures with my new camera. The reason I took so many pictures is so at least one was good out of a 4-shot burst. The problem I had when I got home going over the pictures was they were almost all good. I threw away 100 pictures out of 2000!!! What a camera it did it all, even took great pics. threw the water at a sunken ship while everyone else kept asking me what kind of a camera I had. Because of the large viewing screen everyone around you can see the pic you have taken and you receive many wows!!! Durin ... g the 2 week trip I was asked more then 20 times what kind of camera I had that took such great pics. I even had SLR folks ask. Its a little pricey for a point and shoot but Im glad I bought it. PS did I forget to mention the zoom? Well what can you say when you bring so many things in so close you have to zoom back out a little... O I got it (AWESOME) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Best Purchase i have ever made!
Item.Review: This camera surpassed anything I had in mind about a digital point and shoot. Takes amazing pictures, the settings are easy to use and who can complain about the zoom or megapixels?! This is a camera I would no doubt recommend to anyone that wants a camera that can play with the big shots (dslr's)

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use. Better than SLR
Cons: nothing
I was shopping for a new SLR camera when I came across this camera. I read a review on it in a photography magazine and saw that they rated it very highly. When I compared the price of the camera with the price of a SLR camera and a good zoom lens, I decided to give it a try. I made the right decision. This camera takes professional quality pictures and is very simple to use. I was taking pictures from my boat a few days ago, and had zoomed all the way in (42X). I was getting ready to snap a picture when another boat came along and rocked the boat just as I was snapping the picture. Even though the boat was rocking, the picture came out excellent. Can't give this camera a better review than that.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Easy To Use; Good Image Quality
LOVE this camera. It has an excellent zoom and is so easy to use. Love the date, time & location stamp. Love the quality and color of the pictures.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Short Lag Time; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality; Great Zoom
Cons: Short Battery Life
Good camera, great zoom. Easy to use. Buy an extra battery and I'd suggest getting the accessory charger to charge the battery outside the camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I am very happy with this product
Item.Review: Nikon Camera is used for a hobby and fun. It has all the features of bigger cameras and provides excellent pictures with exceptional quality. Travels well in s compact case. Fun to use much better than the smaller camera I previously tried and the zoom feature is great.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Does everything I need it to
Cons: Neck Strap Rubs, too big for purse
I initially wanted a DSLR but I couldn't afford the individual lenses. This camera has an awesome zoom and I love the hand-shaking prevention on it. I thought the specs were better than the Cannons I saw. I do amateur photography but my pictures look so great and clear. I can photograph bumblebees with no problem. I do use a high speed memory card as well, which works great! I did have to get a large camera bag for everything.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Have already recommended this camera to friends. Have already taken a super sharp and clear photo of a Pilot's n Paws aircraft ready to take of on the runway from 1250 ft away, with one of our rescue dogs on his way to his new home, and photos of a gecko from about 3 inches away, so clear you can count his scales. I take a lot of photos for our FB Amazing Aussies Rescue page and got it primarily to showcase or dogs for adoption in photos and videos. It is very easy to use, although I haven't had time to figure out what ALL the buttons are for, and it does not appear that the GPS works, but that could be something I'm doing wrong. Have always loved taking nature photos and when on vacation, so will be using it extensively for that. My factory rebuild appears to be in apsolute perfect m ... int condition, and just saw it new in Wal-mart for $399. If I bought it there, after taxes, it would have cost about $125 more. I can do a lot for our rescue dogs with $125!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Purchased camera before going on holiday. Intermittent photos out of focus even on auto focus. Lost about 15- 20% of photos. Returned to Comet who replaced camera and second camera had same problem. Asked for refund but Comet would not refund until camera had been returned to Nikon to test. One Month after returning first camera finally received refund after Nikon confirmed faulty.
Poor photos
Avoid Camera Avoid Purchasing from Comet after sales very poor.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This is a great camera. The quality of the photos are amazing. A lot of nice features and the zoom is awesome. Use a lot for performances.. great HD video and photos! Love this camera!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: This is a great camera for beginners to the pro's.
Item.Review:
Pros: Great looking pictures with sharp images. I get compliments on ALL my pics. It also takes perfect pictures in the dark.
Cons: Could use an audio warning when battery is getting low.
I love my camera. i researched many modes before settling on this one. I made the right choice. I would highly recommend it for all ages. It is simple to operate. Also has a zoom that is mind blowing for this camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: The BEST point and shoot EVER!
Item.Review: First of all let me just say this I Love This Camera! It has all the qualities that I would ever want in a camera. If I want to manually choose my settings like I do on my Nikon SLR D90 and D200 I can do so. I love the fact that this camera is so lightweight and it fits in my purse. It has a zoom to die for...and no costly lenses to purchase or put on it. It has an auto setting that makes it great for any novice to operate and the pictures look just as good as they do from my digital SLR Nikon D90 and D200. I am a semi-pro photographer and I would definitely consider using this camera in place of my SLR cameras if I needed to. I have not had any difficulty with the life of the battery that comes with it but I will be purchasing another for backup just because I use it more than most peopl ... e and I tend to leave the power on when not in use. If you are looking for an all round easy camera to operate with great looking photos this is the camera for you. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Zoom,sharp pictures,easy to use
Cons: None
I bought this camera as a birthday gift for my mother. I have to say this camera beats my Canon camera!! This camera takes really good, clear,sharp photos. It is also shoot fast when you use it in the sport setting. My mother loves....loves...to take photos and she wanted a camera that she did not have to change the lens. This camera fits her needs as what she wants! I now want one for myself!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: For the novice photographer - the perfect choice. The camera is very decent amateur level, people who want to leave the camera "clicks and you´re done," what you need. The sound on the video was better than the P100, a focus on video fast. You can enable viewing without removing the lens cap. Zoom button on both sides comfortable. The stabilizer of an adequate - in full zoomed away with well-kept frame.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Reliable; Easy To Set Up
This camera is all I have wanted and a gift from my husband. I am using it for taking pictures basically of birds and flowers and children that I then take and use for making my own greeting cards. The Nikon Coolpix 510 is a great size without bulk to meet all your expectations. Love this zoom!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Everything You Need In This ONE Camera!
Item.Review:
Pros: EVERYTHING!!!
...LOVE THIS CAMERA...best camera i have ever bought...size is great...picture quality is great...just a great all around camera... can't complain about it at all...would rather buy this than the big fancy Nikon D30...love it...i use it for cheer competitions, thursday afternoon and friday night football games...GREAT PICS!!!...

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Wow, this lightweight digital with 42X zoom capability is a great camera for anyone needing more than a point and shoot pocket camera. While not exactly pocket sized, there is not much you cannot do with this versatile digital camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: great for pictures, not for video
Item.Review:
Pros: shooting options, high resolution
Cons: zoom
I have owned numerous Canon camera's and while in a Best Buy noticed the Nikon on display, it had higher resolution, 42x optical zoom and after some deliberation purchased one. Everything was fine on the photograph side of the unit and for that it would be fine. I like to photograph and shoot video of animals, birds, etc. While shooting video of hummingbirds I noticed that when you zoom back out the display jumps slightly to the side and you can feel the play in the lens system. This shows up in the video that you take. I took it back to a different store than where I purchased it and two cameras on display were the same. Even a salesman tried it and got the same result. Everyone was very nice to me and agreed to take it back ... and give me another camera, I picked up a Canon SX40-IS, lost a little optical zoom & resolution but video zoom is as it should be. Maybe a bad batch of cameras but check it out before purchasing one. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: II would buy this product again
Item.Review: I just received my camera a few weeks ago and I am still getting used to it. I have found so far that it is easy to use and the pictures I have taken are very good. I wanted more than point and shoot but not too complicated and I think this will fit my needs.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: The zoom is great !!!
I got this camera for a trip to NYC and love it ! Easy to operate, not heavy at all, the battery life is great, plus it is rechargeable lithium,and the best thing it is the 42 zoom ! I also like to take pics. of my kids and dogs and the colors and sharp picture is amazing.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Super clear pictures, excellent zoom
Cons: It is rather large, so depending on what you're doing it can be a pain to carry
This is a great camera! I absolutely love it. It takes excellent photos, and it has many features to use. I definitely recommend it!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I use this camera for wildlife and weather photography, among other things. I was fortunate enough to catch a small tornado during a storm we had the very first day I had my camera, and was quite pleased with the results. I am still learning how to use this, as it is a bit different from my other camera (a Coolpix P100), but so far I am really loving the quality of pictures and how user friendly this is. I agree with one thing though, and that is indoor pictures do not come out as well as with other cameras without a flash...minor detail though!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Clear pictures, easy to set up, great zoom
Cons: I've found nothing wrong, yet!
I absolutely love this camera! It is easy to hold and steady. The pictures are so clear and colorful. Multiple setting options for any kind of photography you could want.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: The zoom, picture quality, overall performance
Cons: NA
I would recommend this camera to my family and friends. I am on vacation now and I am getting great pictures. The battery seems to last a lot longer then most batteries.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to use good quailty for the price!
Item.Review:
Pros: The settings are easy to use. The battery life is good. I am just extremely happy with this camera all the way around!
Cons: I am not disapointed with any thing as of yet....
I was looking for a new camera and have always had good luck with Nikon its what i am familar with and I am certainly not disapointed with this camera.! The purpose for my purchase is to take photo's of my grandkids and other activities of interest and so far I am excited about the turn out of the photos i have taken so far!!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, lightweight, takes super sharp pictures, awesome zoom
Cons: Can't think of a thing
Love it! I got it right before a 10 day trip to Italy and it took awesome pictures! Zoom has great range, super sharp pictures, great in low light without flash, was able to get a really small camera bag at Walmart (Best Buy did not have small ones at the time) that camera just fit it in so it was small enough to fit in my purse. Can't beat the zoom or ease to use. Counting my children's Nikon's, this is the 5th one I have bought starting with SLR 30 years ago.....have loved them all and all still take great pictures. One had to be sent off to Nikon and got great service with minimal charge for shipping. Love Nikon, love this camera!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Love this camera. Very straight forward to use.
Item.Review:
Pros: The telephoto lens is fantastic.
I photograph a lot of animals in the wild, so the telephoto capacity was very important to me. This camera has been a tremendous help in getting those closeup shots without having to lug my big camera around.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: This camera has an incredible 42 Zoom. I take my pictures from my window at the station where the end of the block in my house.
Cons: I've shoot Bus stop's map where the across the street and I saw in picture clear map and Bus numbers. My eyes can't see that but camera does.
I record Full HD video with stereo audio too. So I hightly recomend this product.You''ll take a Best photo for that camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Accurate; Awesome Camera; Reliable
I bought this camera to take pics of my kids on the football field. It zooms wonderfully. I do not even have to move from the bleachers to get a great shot on the field.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: All The Camera You Should Ever Need
Item.Review: I'm a pro photog and techno geek, so people ask me for advice all the time. A friend was really into the telephoto range but didn't want to schlep tons of equipment so I recommended the Nikon P510. He had one in no time and asked my wife and me to dinner! Well, now wifey saw his camera and reminded me that she always needed more tele too, so back to B&H for another purchase. By the way, B&H refurbs are clean as a whistle - don't ever hesitate to save another 25% or so. In particular, Image Stabilization at extreme telephoto is nothing short of amazing.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 42X zoom 1080 video
Cons: none
highly recommend this camera! so easy to use! I am a stylist and use it primarily for work. The detail is phenomenal! I love that this camera is "hybrid" meaning simple like a point and shoot but lens quality compared to professional interchangeable cameras, great that you get the quality without having to purchase multiple lenses for this camera but is in great comparison to professional camera.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: We bought this camera because we were expecting our first child and wanted to be able to take quality pictures. So far it has been easy to use and takes great pictures!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: This camera has an amazing zoom without having to change lenses.
My wife said she wanted this camera for her birthday and I thought surely there are other cameras out there on the internet that will be comparable and cheaper so I researched it didn't find anything close. So I went ahead and bought it, best decision ever I just can't get over the quality of the zoom. I set the camera up next to my father-in-laws camera with his longest zoom and with just the optical zoom I could out reach his and mine is much lighter and there are no lenses to change for the different shots. It's my wife's camera some times I let her use it.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use. Easy to charge the battery.
I love this Nikon camera. This camera is so easy to use and charging of the battery is very easy.. Leave it in the camera, plug it in over night and ready to go the next day..... A great camera for your vacation!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: My first NIKON, that won't be the last
Item.Review: I purchased this camera for it's versatility and price. This little bundle of digital wonder has everything what someone might need, from a day out in the park, to a visit to Kruger National Park. No more changing lenses, calculating etc(still has a M setting for those who like to waste time). Has built in GPS, panorama, HDR etc. Finally a camera I'm very happy with:-)

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera with an amazing optical zoom
Item.Review:
Pros: Amazing zoom and picture quality
Cons: Lack of hot-shoe and imposibility to add optical filters
Excellent camera. The optical zoom itself makes this camera a great deal. You would have to expend a lot of money to get the same zoom in a conventional DSLR. It is not possible to add an external flash due to the lack of a hot shoe, but depending on the usage, you may not need one. One downside is that it is not possible to add optical filters, which I like to use. But, again, most casual photographers may never need/want to use a filter.
Personally I do not like the camera look, it is kind of cheap if compared to similar cameras from Canon. I bough the Nikon manly due to the fantastic zoom, it is very useful in outdoor environments.
The camera is capa ... ble of taking 3D pictures but you need a 3D capable TV to view the photos. The 3D pictures look good but it is tricky to take. Subject has to be steady since the picture is taken in to steps (left eye and right eye) It takes some trial-and-error to learn the technique.
Overall, it is a great camera, I'm very satisfied whit this purchase. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Love it, Love it, Love it
Item.Review: So far I haven't found anything I don't like about this camera. It is so easy to use and the pictures are fantastic. My nephew who is a photographer helped me pick this out. He said you got more bang for you buck with this camera. Like I said before I love it and definitele would buy it again. Thank you for selling such an excellent product.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I just recently purchased this camera.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient
I have a Nikon SLR, love the camera but hate that I have to change the lens for zooming in. This Nikon P510 has an awesome zoom that takes getting use to if you dont have a tripod when your using the zoom to full capacity. Takes great pictures, very comparitable to my SLR. I still have plenty to learn about it but so far its pretty nice and easy to use.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use
Cons: Camera bag I bought with the camera
Great photos from an amateur like myself? Glad I bought the camera, very user friendly, light wieght.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera for those in the stands kind of shots
Item.Review:
Pros: Zoom in abilty and picture quality
Cons: a little bigger than the averge pocket camera but quality is worth its size
I bought this camera because my kids play sports. I had no pictures that weren't blurry or dark. This camera has full-filled my needs with getting those great action shots from in stands. I use it for school performances as well and my pictures are no longer dark! Just last week I went to a college graduation in a huge arena. I was able to zoom in from way up in the balcony and get great shots/pictures just as if I was in a seat on the lower level.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Compact; Ergonomic Design; Lightweight
Cons: No Interchangeable Lenses; Limited Video Zoom; Cannot Use Filters
Powerfull, lightweight, and attractive camera. Another winner!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Nikon P510 dont be put off this camera
Item.Review: I dont pretend to be anything other than a keen amateur. my old 35mm cameras included Yashica J, I still have Pentax MX and Minolta SR7. Most recently I have bought Lumix and won Lumix cameras in panasonic competitions, I have 6 the latest a fz45 bridge camera (magic) ,on buying the Nikon P510 I was not upset in any way, I have read reports that say auto focus is poor I have not found this ,autofocus needs contrast to work at its best on any camera, and the zoom range is a wonder to behold. Bought from Comet as was my Lumix ,the Nikon has been with me for about 2 weeks so far it has done all I have asked of it, always wanted a Nikon now I have one ,chuffed. Read the manual it makes all the difference

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use
Cons: Not sure if i will like that fact that the battery needs to be plugged in, instead of having regular batteries
Great camera and highly recommended to me by a professional, so I know it will suit my needs perfectly.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I use this product for construction documentation. The panaramic function of the camera helps tremendously. The help that the camera provides to stitch the pics together is great. Also the 3d aspect is helpful for presentations. It adds a little something to show a rack of rebar popping out of a footing.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I purchased the P510 after a thorough internet search for reviews, pros and cons. It is indeed a very nice camera, light weight, easy to grasp by one hand, easy to operate (friendly also to lefties!)gets great zoom with high resolution even without tripod. My wife loves it and actually took it from me. Takes wonderful pics of babies and children as well as close-ups (flowers,fire flies etc.) and above all the HDR mode is a wonderful solution to sceneries with both dark and bright areas, and this is just very simple to operate. I did not find any cons - we just enjoy using the camea.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Light and fits like a glove. I used to photograph weddings with an 80-210MM lens. I always said that if I could get a 50-500MM lens I'd weld it on the camera. This is 24-1000mm and clear as any Nikkor lens. Controls are right where they should be and changeable. It does so much that it takes time to learn all it can do, and if you forget something it isn't very forgiving. Love it!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I can't wait to vacation with my camera
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Quality Construction; Great to travel with; Easy to Use; Love the zoom capability; Easy To Set Up; Efficient
I have already recommended this camera to a friend. I have other more expensive cameras, but I will carry this one with me and use it whenever I travel, as well as for everyday use.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Efficient; Easy to Use; Great zoom; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
Cons: Skimpy instruction manual
I would have liked a more comprehensive manual with the camera. The DVD is good but who can carry it around with them for reference purposes?

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: hello at the beginning i would like to say this camera is the bridge between easy camera and professional camera if you are beginner you can use it if you are professional you can find professional setteing you want to capture a great shots the best things you can find 1- great quality for shots resolution and colors 2- great zoom to capture a distince object 3- iam an archtecture eng. it is the best camera to use to thake shots for buildings even you take a wide shoot or very close details even macro or very far detail like ornametels on mosque you can also use it indoor to take very wide shots 4- variable setting to adjust your camera to shoot any things at many conditions but there is something missed that i hope that it could save photos in raw format , tga format tiff format besid ... e jpg ihope it could have external flash add some extra bottuns for fast setting adjusment thanx expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 42x zoom lense
Cons: battery charger
So I just got this today.For the price I was hoping for a seperate battery charger .In order to charge it you must hook a cable to the camera.The charging takes place while the battery is in the camera.On my old dslr you would pull the battery out and just charge it.This is inconvenient because I don't like to leave my camera set out.So far it seems to take good pics.Only other downside you can only record video for 15 minutes then it shuts off.The zoom is excellent.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: EASY TO USE WITH FAMILY JUST POINT AND SHOOT
Cons: VIDEO SHOOTING IN LOW LIGHT
I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THE OVERALL VALUE OF THIS CAMERA FOR FAMILY AND BUSINESS USE,

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

42 power great for athletic events and wildlife shots.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: So far I Love this camera, easy to use. Great for someone that wnats to takes great pictures put does not want a DSLR The price was great.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Great camera if you want the features of a DSLR but not the weight

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Love the zoom capability.
Cons: Short battery life.
It's a good camera for traveling...much easier than full DSLR set-up.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
I have had this camera for about 2 month now and I love this camera. Takes great pictures and videos. I also love the slow motion video.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: It gives a lot of great features, like its 42x optical zoom, and it has a very fast shooting, being almost a semi-pro camera, but with a low price.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Best camera I've had by far!!!!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, pic quality, zoom
I love this camera! It's lightweight, the picture quality is excellent & the zoom range is amazing!!!

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture quality, zoom and stability
Results are better than expected. Zoom and stability are excellent.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: easy car around Light goes to 1000 way above my Canon 5D III and my 70-200 Is lens Can't put a UV or a filter on the lens

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Great camera. Great quality pictures and very easy to use! Great buy at B&H

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Definitelye would buy this product again
Item.Review: This product is used by our Marketing Department to pictures of our products for our customers. The camera takes great pictures and is very easy to use.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

I use my camera alot,, I take pictures everyday, it is easy to use, easy to focas and the zoom is great...

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

I love this calendar. It is easy to use. Great pictures.

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

Item.Item: Nikon Coolpix P510 16.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
